name: Probabilistic Bound on Total Perturbation-Induced Displacement
relations_established: Probabilistic bound on perturbation displacement using McDiarmid's inequality
natural_language_statement: With high probability (under concentration inequalities), the total perturbation-induced displacement across all walkers is bounded by a function of the number of walkers and perturbation scale.
full_statement_text: With high probability (under concentration inequalities), the total perturbation-induced displacement across all walkers is bounded by a function of the number of walkers and perturbation scale.
